title: Finding Fractions
text:
EnglishVietnameseGiven a, b, c, d, find a fraction p/q with minimum q, and satisfied a/b < p/q < c/d.InputFor each test case, one line contains four integers a, b, c, d.OutputFor each test case, print the fraction (see the sample for details). If multiple solution exists, output the one with minimum p.ExampleInput:1 3 1 2
2 1 3 1
2 1 4 1
1000 1001 1001 1002Output:2/5
5/2
3/1
2001/2003ConstraintsDataset 1: a, b, c, d (1 ≤ a, b, c, d ≤ 1e9, and a/b < c/d)
